property_sql_factory_datasets.sql:
SELECT 
    <%=sourceSystem%>  || '::' ||  "HZ_CUST_ACCOUNTS"."CustAccountId"    AS "ID",
    "HZ_CUST_ACCOUNTS"."AccountNumber"                                   AS "Number",
    "HZ_PARTIES"."PartyName"                                             AS "Name",
    CASE
        WHEN "HZ_CUST_ACCOUNTS"."CustomerType" = 'I'
            THEN TRUE
        ELSE FALSE 
    END                                                                  AS "InternalFlag",
    "HZ_PARTIES"."Country"                                               AS "Country",
    "HZ_PARTIES"."County"                                                AS "Region",
    "HZ_PARTIES"."City"                                                  AS "City",
    "HZ_PARTIES"."PostalCode"                                            AS "PostalCode",
    "HZ_PARTIES"."Address1"                                              AS "Address",
    <%=sourceSystem%>                                                    AS "SourceSystemInstance"
FROM "FscmTopModelAM_PartiesAnalyticsAM_CustomerAccount" AS "HZ_CUST_ACCOUNTS"
    LEFT JOIN "FscmTopModelAM_PartiesAnalyticsAM_Customer" AS "HZ_PARTIES" 
        ON "HZ_CUST_ACCOUNTS"."PartyId" = "HZ_PARTIES"."PartyId"

SELECT <%=sourceSystem%>  || '::' || "KNA1"."MANDT" || '::' || "KNA1"."KUNNR"   AS "ID",
    "KNA1"."NAME1"                                                              AS "Name",
    CASE WHEN "KNA1"."VBUND" IS NULL THEN FALSE ELSE TRUE END                   AS "InternalFlag",
    "KNA1"."LAND1"                                                              AS "Country",
    "KNA1"."REGIO"                                                              AS "Region",
    "KNA1"."ORT01"                                                              AS "City",
    "KNA1"."PSTLZ"                                                              AS "PostalCode",
    "KNA1"."STRAS"                                                              AS "Address",
    "KNA1"."KUNNR"                                                              AS "Number",
	<%=sourceSystem%> || '::' || "KNA1"."MANDT"                                 AS "SourceSystemInstance"
FROM "KNA1" AS "KNA1"
WHERE "KNA1"."MANDT" IS NOT NULL

WITH "CTE_InternalCustomers" AS (
    SELECT DISTINCT
        "FUN_CUSTOMER_MAPS"."CUST_ACCOUNT_ID" AS "CUST_ACCOUNT_ID"
    FROM "FUN_CUSTOMER_MAPS" AS "FUN_CUSTOMER_MAPS"
)
SELECT 
    <%=sourceSystem%>  || '::' || "HZ_CUST_ACCOUNTS"."CUST_ACCOUNT_ID"       AS "ID",
    "HZ_CUST_ACCOUNTS"."ACCOUNT_NUMBER"                                      AS "Number",
    "HZ_PARTIES"."PARTY_NAME"                                                AS "Name",
    "HZ_PARTIES"."COUNTRY"                                                   AS "Country",
    "HZ_PARTIES"."COUNTY"                                                    AS "Region",
    "HZ_PARTIES"."CITY"                                                      AS "City",
    "HZ_PARTIES"."POSTAL_CODE"                                               AS "PostalCode",
    "HZ_PARTIES"."ADDRESS1"                                                  AS "Address",
    CASE
        WHEN "HZ_CUST_ACCOUNTS"."CUSTOMER_TYPE" = 'I'
            THEN TRUE
        WHEN "InternalCustomers"."CUST_ACCOUNT_ID" IS NOT NULL
            THEN TRUE
        ELSE FALSE 
    END                                                                      AS "InternalFlag",       
    <%=sourceSystem%>                                                        AS "SourceSystemInstance"
FROM "HZ_CUST_ACCOUNTS" AS "HZ_CUST_ACCOUNTS"
    LEFT JOIN "HZ_PARTIES" AS "HZ_PARTIES"
        ON "HZ_CUST_ACCOUNTS"."PARTY_ID" = "HZ_PARTIES"."PARTY_ID"
    LEFT JOIN "CTE_InternalCustomers" AS "InternalCustomers" 
        ON "HZ_CUST_ACCOUNTS"."CUST_ACCOUNT_ID" = "InternalCustomers"."CUST_ACCOUNT_ID"

SELECT <%=sourceSystem%>  || '::' || "KNA1"."MANDT" || '::' || "KNA1"."KUNNR"   AS "ID",
    "KNA1"."NAME1"                                                              AS "Name",
    CASE WHEN "KNA1"."VBUND" IS NULL THEN FALSE ELSE TRUE END                   AS "InternalFlag",
    "KNA1"."LAND1"                                                              AS "Country",
    "KNA1"."REGIO"                                                              AS "Region",
    "KNA1"."ORT01"                                                              AS "City",
    "KNA1"."PSTLZ"                                                              AS "PostalCode",
    "KNA1"."STRAS"                                                              AS "Address",
    "KNA1"."KUNNR"                                                              AS "Number",
	<%=sourceSystem%> || '::' || "KNA1"."MANDT"                                 AS "SourceSystemInstance"
FROM "KNA1" AS "KNA1"
WHERE "KNA1"."MANDT" IS NOT NULL
